segments.text: I notice the open window letting in daylight to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is meticulously drying that plate, quite absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, the faucet's on and the sink is full to the brim!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading over the edge—how did that happen so fast?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's submerged, yet she hasn't flinched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, a boy's on a stool going for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open, and he's got cookies in hand already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is leaning back—precarious position!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, arm extended, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene, bushes neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing she hasn't turned to see the commotion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This blend of calm and hidden trouble is unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't anticipate the overflow mixing with the cookie caper.
segments.speaker: PAR
